attributes.action: Add to a child arrangemts order power of arrest
attributes.background: Currently parents who breach a child arrangemt order can not be arrested as it's a civil matter even tho it has been to court, all that can happen is they will be taken back to court for a fine,community service,compensation for loss of money or short prison stay which has never happen!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Child arrangements orders can already be enforced by requiring unpaid work, a fine or imprisonment, which may involve arrest. It is not clear what else you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168943
